name: CAO - Cameroon - Belicoso
additionalNotes: CAO Cameroon is a classically blended cigar that showcases a beautiful, delicate Cameroon wrapper. Beneath this wrapper, you’ll find a rich blend of Nicaraguan tobaccos that yields a smooth, sweet aroma with the faintest hint of spicy goodness. Handmade in Nicaragua, CAO Cameroon delivers a medium-bodied finish with nutty notes of coffee, wood, and cocoa in a handful of classic shapes.
